elements.name: As a user i want to create account

steps.name: i navigate to  home page
i click sign in
i type email address in other to register
i click create account button
i Enter Personal Information
i Enter Address and Contact details
i click register button to complete registration
i verify account name to confirm Account has been created

elements.name: As a user i want to be able to delete item in basket

steps.name: i navigate to  home page
i click sign in
i login successfully
i add a dress to my Shopping Cart

i delete dress from Shopping cart

i navigate to  home page
i Mouse over Women Menu to reveal options
i click summer dresses
